title: "Authentication Service"
body: Well, I'm typing in my password, and it says "Unable to connect authentication service". So I retype my user name AND password and it still repeats. So, I don't know what to do anymore, I closed and open my client, and i re set my computer, but still same thing appears !! May I get so answers because i just want to play some League!

replies.body: Hey guys!  Already got a[ sticky post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/b5AbXoEc-nov-18-1017-na-login-issues) up and running, and we put up a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Our network team is aware and looking into it now!
Same thing is happening to me, I can't login and play

>
> Same thing is happening to me, I can't login and play

Hi remember me?
working for me!  Off to the rift
Like It happened to my friend too, I'm not sure if it's a bug or not.
This was happening to me but it just let me in now, so it may be fixed.
Its a trick, riot games are trying to sabotage tyler1's championship series. You heard it here first.

Riot knows and they're working on it.

They just put this up yeah
